content.rendered:
Shipping Lead | Catoosa, OK
  • Large company looking for a Shipping Lead for their warehouse/distribution center
  • Background in shipping and distribution
  • High school education or equivalent required
  • Two years shipping experience preferred
  • Basic PC skills including Microsoft Office
  • Working knowledge of correct documentation and shipping procedures for international orders
  • Must have knowledge of packaging and quality control procedures
  • Ability to frequently lift up to 40 lbs
  • Able to work flexible hours and overtime when required
  • Must be able to stand for minimum of 8 hours
  • Must be certified to operate powered industrial truck (forklift, stock picker, Rider pallet jack)
  • Must be able to operate stretch wrap machine
  • Full time position, with compensation of $14-$16/hr + benefits
